title: Starting a Food Forest on the Cheap!

tasks.task: Start a food forest on the cheap using free seeds and cuttings.
subtasks: Post on Facebook requesting seeds and cuttings from friends.
Collect seeds and cuttings from friends and other sources.
Research proper care for each fruit type.
Prepare deep root pots for planting pawpaw seeds.
Plant seeds and cuttings in prepared pots.
Water and care for the planted seeds and cuttings.
Identify locations for different layers of plants.
Determine the types of trees, shrubs, vines, and ground cover.
Integrate useful plants like comfrey and artichoke.
Share extra plants with fellow gardeners.
Pay it forward by sharing knowledge and resources.
Use collected rainwater to water plants.
